statements: SELECT * FROM data_retention_policies
SELECT policy_id, policy_name FROM data_retention_policies WHERE retention_period > 5
SELECT * FROM data_retention_policies WHERE legal_compliance = true
SELECT policy_name, retention_period FROM data_retention_policies WHERE policy_id = 3
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM data_retention_policies
SELECT policy_name, retention_period FROM data_retention_policies ORDER BY retention_period DESC
SELECT * FROM data_retention_policies WHERE legal_compliance = true
SELECT policy_id, policy_name, retention_period FROM data_retention_policies WHERE retention_period > 30
SELECT policy_name FROM data_retention_policies WHERE policy_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_policies FROM data_retention_policies
SELECT * FROM data_retention_policies WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT policy_name, retention_period FROM data_retention_policies WHERE compliance_status = true;
SELECT * FROM compliance_logs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT policy_name, retention_period, compliance_status FROM data_retention_policies ORDER BY policy_name ASC;
SELECT log_id, log_details FROM compliance_logs ORDER BY log_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM data_retention_policies WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT policy_name, retention_period FROM data_retention_policies WHERE retention_period > 30;
SELECT policy_id, policy_name, retention_period, compliance_status FROM data_retention_policies WHERE policy_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM compliance_logs JOIN data_retention_policies ON compliance_logs.policy_id = data_retention_policies.policy_id;

SELECT policy_name, COUNT(policy_id) AS log_count FROM data_retention_policies LEFT JOIN compliance_logs ON data_retention_policies.policy_id = compliance_logs.policy_id GROUP BY policy_name ORDER BY log_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM organization;
SELECT org_name, founded_date FROM organization ORDER BY founded_date DESC;
SELECT org_name, policy_name FROM organization JOIN data_retention_policy ON organization.data_retention_policy_id = data_retention_policy.id;
SELECT org_name, jurisdiction FROM organization JOIN data_protection_law ON organization.data_protection_law_id = data_protection_law.law_id;

SELECT org_name, founded_date, policy_name, jurisdiction FROM organization JOIN data_retention_policy ON organization.data_retention_policy_id = data_retention_policy.id JOIN data_protection_law ON organization.data_protection_law_id = data_protection_law.law_id ORDER BY founded_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM data_retention_policy ORDER BY retention_period DESC;
SELECT org_name, founded_date FROM organization WHERE org_id = 5;
SELECT law_name, jurisdiction FROM data_protection_law WHERE jurisdiction = 'EU';
SELECT org_name, policy_name, retention_period FROM organization JOIN data_retention_policy ON organization.data_retention_policy_id = data_retention_policy.id WHERE founded_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT org_name, law_name FROM organization JOIN data_protection_law ON organization.data_protection_law_id = data_protection_law.law_id ORDER BY org_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM data_retention_policies;
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM data_retention_policies WHERE retention_period > 365;
SELECT data_id, data_name, data_type FROM organization_data ORDER BY data_type DESC;
SELECT law_name, law_description, compliance_level FROM data_protection_laws WHERE compliance_level = 'High';
SELECT log_id, timestamp, action_performed, user_id FROM data_audit_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM data_retention_policies ORDER BY retention_period DESC;
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM data_retention_policies WHERE policy_name LIKE '%retention%';

SELECT data_name, data_owner, policy_name, compliance_level FROM organization_data JOIN data_retention_policies ON organization_data.data_retention_policy_id = data_retention_policies.id JOIN data_protection_laws ON organization_data.data_protection_law_id = data_protection_laws.law_id;
SELECT * FROM data_audit_logs WHERE action_performed = 'delete' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT data_type, COUNT(*) AS count FROM organization_data GROUP BY data_type HAVING count > 1;
SELECT * FROM DataRetentionPolicies;
SELECT policy_name, retention_period FROM DataRetentionPolicies ORDER BY retention_period DESC;
SELECT organization_name, data_type, data_size FROM OrganizationData WHERE data_size > 1000;
SELECT requestor_name, request_type, request_status FROM DataRequests WHERE request_status = 'Completed';
SELECT user_id, access_time FROM DataAccessLogs WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM DataRetentionPolicies ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT policy_name, retention_period FROM DataRetentionPolicies WHERE retention_period > 30;
SELECT organization_name, data_size FROM OrganizationData WHERE data_type = 'Customer';
SELECT law_name, compliance_date FROM DataProtectionLaws WHERE compliance_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT requestor_name, request_type, request_status FROM DataRequests WHERE request_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY request_type DESC;
